means: 弄清，确定，查明( ascertain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The previously unidentified objects have now been definitely ascertained as being satellites.
sentence.Network_cn: 原来所说的不明飞行物现在已证实是卫星.

sentence.Network_en: I ascertained that she was dead.
Once they had ascertained that he was not a spy, they agreed to release him.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦确认他并非间谍，他们即同意将他释放。

PerfectNetExp.abs: as soon as the purchase is made , and the price ascertained , I will inform you at what they will be invoiced .当我们查明何时有货，价格多少时，将立即通知贵公司，以什么价格可以成交。
this reporter the recent conference the Shandong ascertained .这是记者在最近召开的山东省国土资源工作会议上了解到的。

list.abs: ascertain 确定ascertainment error 确定性误差ascertainment 确定
ascertaining type decision 确定型决策ascertainment error 断定误差aschaffite 英云斜煌岩
ascertain 查明ascertained weight 确定的重量ascertaining the ship's position 定船位
ascertain 判明ascertain facts 查清-
ascent curve 上升曲线ascertain loss 确定损失ascertain the responsibility 判明责任

entry.tran: （尤指经过努力后）查明，弄清，确定
entry.def: If you ascertain the truth about something, you find out what it is, especially by making a deliberate effort to do so.

example.ex: Through doing this, the teacher will be able to ascertain the extent to which the child understands what he is reading...
example.tran: 这样一来，老师就能确定孩子们对他所读的内容理解多少了。

example.ex: Once they had ascertained that he was not a spy, they agreed to release him...
example.tran: 一旦确认他并非间谍，他们即同意将他释放。

means.word_mean: 1. discovered or determined by scientific observation;

sentences.sentence: "variation in the ascertained flux depends on a number of factors"

auth_sentence.content: Who may perhaps...Be ascertained that Two and Two make four.
auth_sentence.res_content: Who may perhaps...Be ascertained that Two and Two make four.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who may perhaps...Be ascertained that Two and Two make four.

auth_sentence.content: I wish to be ascertained of the...intentions of the Court.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wish to be ascertained of the...intentions of the Court.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wish to be ascertained of the...intentions of the Court.

auth_sentence.content: The moment of his mother's arrival was never clearly ascertained.
auth_sentence.res_content: The moment of his mother's arrival was never clearly ascertained.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The moment of his mother's arrival was never clearly ascertained.
